channel.title: 华尔街日报

item.title: 拳击手奥斯卡-德拉霍亚（Oscar De La Hoya）在拉斯维加斯再下一城--这一次，他将在拉斯维加斯建造一座豪华住宅，其中包括一个价值 40 万美元的私人洞穴和一个向其职业生涯致敬的房间。
item.description:
Boxer Oscar De La Hoya is going another round with Las Vegas—this time with a tricked out home with features like a $400,000 man cave and a tribute room that pays homage to his career https://t.co/mJigeZP8XK https://t.co/mJigeZP8XK

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会表示，Sun Microsystems 和 Arista Networks 的联合创始人 Andy Bechtolsheim 已同意支付近 100 万美元，以解决有关他进行内幕交易的指控。
item.description:

item.title: 美国橄榄球联盟（NFL）表示，由于今年的 12 月 25 日是周三，因此不会在这一天安排比赛。但上赛季圣诞阵容的成功促使它做出了让步。
item.description:
The NFL said it wouldn’t schedule games on Dec. 25 this year because it fell on a Wednesday. But the success of last season’s Christmas lineup prompted it to call an audible. https://t.co/wWQtCDT6jy https://t.co/wWQtCDT6jy

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 当史蒂夫-布西密离开纽约联邦储备委员会开始演艺事业时，他的父母非常紧张。"我爸爸会说，'那接下来怎么办？'我会说，'其实，我也不知道。他会说'哦，那你失业了'"
item.description:
Steve Buscemi's parents were nervous when he left the FDNY to pursue acting. "My dad would say, 'So what’s next?' I’d say, 'Actually, I don’t know.' He’d say, 'Oh, so you’re unemployed.'” https://t.co/Ap7CCjjRuJ https://t.co/Ap7CCjjRuJ

item.title: 迈克-加拉格尔（Mike Gallagher），这位来自威斯康星州的四届共和党人，率先提出了可能在美国关闭 TikTok 的法案，他将辞去国会席位。他的离职可能会扰乱华盛顿对中国的信息传递。
item.description:
Mike Gallagher, the four-term Republican from Wisconsin who spearheaded the bill that could shut down TikTok in the U.S., is resigning his congressional seat. His exit likely to disrupt Washington’s messaging about China. https://t.co/kxwlx11kGw https://t.co/kxwlx11kGw

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 它看起来就像一个标准的纽约市停车场。但自 2024 年初以来，这座位于曼哈顿西村的建筑已经签订了超过 1 亿美元的交易。
item.description:
It looks like your standard New York City parking garage. But since the beginning of 2024, more than $100 million in deals have been inked at the building in Manhattan's West Village. https://t.co/X72e1Lf9Ew https://t.co/X72e1Lf9Ew

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体公司股价在上市首日大涨 40%，使这位总统候选人的身家大增。问题是，他多久才能动用他在 Truth Social 大约 55 亿美元的股份？
item.description:
Shares of Donald Trump’s social-media company surged 40% on their first day of trading, boosting the presidential candidate’s fortune.

The question is, how soon can he tap his roughly $5.5 billion stake in Truth Social? https://t.co/aXX4ka9gNA https://t.co/aXX4ka9gNA
